page.title: 18A Saturday Excursion.
page.content: The first words I hear every morning are"Sharon,it's time to get up".I jump out of bed,wash and dress then I go downstairs to watch television and practise my violin for about half an hour.After this I'm free to play and feed my fish in the garden until lunchtime. After lunch I change ready for the trip to Carmarthen with Mammy and Daddy.On the journey Mammy and I watch the new born lambs playing in the fields.In the hedgerows the daffodils and primroses are in bloom.When we reach Carmarthen,Daddy parks the Dormobile and we go into a cafe for a cup of tea.We then walk around the indoor market for Mammy to do our shopping for the week.When we arrive home I usually watch T.V.for a while before going to bed at nine o'clock.
